name: specs_v1_tier1
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool datamo.
Tool description: Datamo is a RESTful API that provides extensive electric and combustion vehicle specification data.
API description: Pull requested vehicle data for specific field parameters. Tier 1 allows the following to be queried by:  
1. make
2. model

At least one query parameter is required for a successful call.

make.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call. For purpose of testing through the RapidAPI interface, this is required. Normally, only one of any additional query parameters is required. i.e. make, model, engineType, ...

sortby.description: The field you would like to sort by.

order.description: The sort order of the specified field.

model.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

page.description: The page of data returned, starting with index 1 (Default 1)

per_page.description: The number of entries returned per query. The default is 10 per page. The max per page is 250.

fields.description: Over 100+ returnable fields including: make, model, engineType, bodyType, msrp, etc. See the Datamo website for a full list. Leave blank to return all fields.
